|November 21, 2022
|The popular "Golden Shrimp Balls" might just be the perfect example of modern-day Liyue cuisine, with its brilliant golden color and irresistible [[potato]] fragrance.<br />It is a masterpiece of both presentation and flavor.<br />Even [[Keqing]], the Yuheng of the [[Qixing]], who has savored countless delicacies, has nothing but the highest praise for it.
